meanings.definition: The process of adding fluoride to a water supply to prevent tooth decay.
meanings.sent1: Fluoridation is important for keeping our teeth healthy.
meanings.sent2: The city decided to implement fluoridation in the water system.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke about fluoridation making the water taste like toothpaste!
meanings.sent4: Her smile sparkled like fluoridation had been sprinkled on her teeth.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of fluoridation are clear when you see fewer cavities in children.

meanings.definition: The act of treating something with fluoride to improve dental health.
meanings.sent1: Dentists recommend fluoridation to strengthen enamel.
meanings.sent2: After the fluoridation treatment, my teeth felt smoother.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled fluoridation solution on my toothbrush!
meanings.sent4: Her teeth shone as if they had been kissed by fluoridation.
meanings.sent5: The power of fluoridation is evident in the bright smiles of the community.
